plot: Sequel to Nosotros los Pobres (1947). This time, Pepe &"El Toro&" (Infante) is married with &"La Chorreada&" (Pavon) and they have two children. Chachita (Munoz) knows her real grandma: Charito (Derba), a rich woman who takes Chachita away from Pepe and tries to convert her into a rich girl. El Pichi (Fernandez) and Chachita are inlove, but social differences take them apart. This time, tragedy overcomes when Pepe's son, El Torito (Giron) dies in a fire.   Written by  Maximiliano Maza
title: Ustedes, los ricos
